name: No GAME OVER
description:
This is the first game I've ever made for a Game Jam. In fact, it's the first unity project I haven't quit halfway through. It's why I'm doing more jams in the future.

Anyway "No GAME OVER" is a game without failure. (At least until you give up). 

-No lives

-No 1-UP's

-No Game Over (get the title now)

Instead of losing you just play the level again. But there might be some small differences this time. 

The game isn't great, but for my first Jam, I am proud. Please give it a go. And waste some time. I am open to all criticism that I will receive. 

Have fun...
